name: The Legendary Exodia Phantom Incarnate
text:
5 "Forbidden One" monsters
This card on the field cannot be destroyed by your opponent's card effects. Once per turn, if this card battles, during damage calculation: It gains ATK equal to your current LP. Once per turn, when a Spell/Trap Card or effect is activated (Quick effect): You can negate the activation. Once per turn, during the End Phase: You can Set 1 "Exodo" Spell/Trap or "Obliterate!!!" directly from your Deck. Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: You lose 1000 LP.
